sections.paragraph: Original: דּרשׁ
Transliteration: dârash
Phonetic: daw-rash'
வினைச்சொல் - இர, கேள், பழிவாங்கு. ஆராயப்படு, தேடப்படு, தேடு, விசாரி, நாடு, ஆராய். விண்ணப்பம் பண்ணு, விசாரணை செய்.
to resort to, seek, seek with care, enquire, require
a) (Qal)
1) to resort to, to frequent (a place), (to treada place)
2) to consult, to enquire of, to seek
a) used of God
b) used of heathen gods, necromancers
3) to seek deity in prayer and worship
a) God
b) heathen deities
4) to seek (with a demand), to demand, to require
5) to investigate, to enquire
6) to ask for, to require, to demand
7) to practice, to study, to follow, to seek with application
8) to seek with care, to care for
b) (Niphal)
1) to allow oneself to be enquired of, to be consulted (used only of God)
2) to be sought, to be sought out
3) to be required (used of blood)
Cognate: H1875, H4097
